channel.title: CVE Feed for Imagely -- WordPress Gallery Plugin – NextGEN Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Imagely -- WordPress Gallery Plugin – NextGEN Gallery

item.title: CVE-2023-48328|2024-08-02T21:23:39.500Z -- imagely -- wordpress%20gallery%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20nextgen%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Imagely WordPress Gallery Plugin – NextGEN Gallery allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects WordPress Gallery Plugin – NextGEN Gallery: from n/a through 3.37.
